name: OpenAI GPT-5
purpose: Advanced AI model for parsing unstructured data, visual design analysis, and comprehensive documentation generation
description: Large language model with strong capabilities in visual interpretation, unstructured data parsing, and detailed documentation writing. Used in lead generation workflows for HTML parsing and contact extraction. Also excels at design system analysis - extracting design principles from screenshots and generating comprehensive design documentation. Superior to Claude for visual analysis and detailed specification writing.

primary_uses: AI-Powered HTML Parsing for Lead Extraction
Visual Design Analysis and Style Extraction
use_cases: parse unstructured HTML for contact data
analyze design system screenshots for style extraction
extract design principles from visual inspiration
workflows: AI Website Content Extraction (n8n + OpenAI + Apify → Anymailfinder → 10-20% enrichment)

steps: GPT-5 analyzes design.json + showcase app code
Includes all component specs, accessibility, patterns

strengths: Superior visual interpretation and design analysis
Strong at extracting design principles from images
limitations: Lower success rate for lead gen (10-20%)
Requires orchestration tools (n8n for lead gen, Cursor for design)
Not as strong as Claude/Sonnet for code generation

model_specialization.recommended_use_pattern: Use GPT-5 for analysis and documentation (Prompts 1 & 3); switch to Claude/Sonnet for code generation (Prompt 2)

success_rate: 10-20% email enrichment (lower but handles difficult sources)
